text: Ra uniharumadhye (kehi yasta pani chan) jasale timitira kana thapeko hunchan yahamsam'ma ki (sabai kura sundachan tara) jaba timro pasabata niskera janchan taba juna manisaharula'i jnana cha unisita sodhchan, unale ahile ke bhaneka chan? Yi nai manisaharu hun jasaka hrdayaharuma allahale mohara (chapa) laga'idi'eko cha ra uniharule aphna icchaharuko pachi hindirakheka chan
